text: “Goodou heia Tagamiami o di Palaawaa Digi Hagatanga. Goodou geina go nia palaawaa digi hagatanga ina i lodo nia laangi e hidu i lodo di malama go Abib, be agu helekai ala gu hai adu, idimaa, deelaa di malama ne hagatanga goodou gi daha mo Egypt.34.18 Exodus 12.14-20; Leviticus 23.6-8; Numbers 28.16-25
